# Oneiromancy Spells
## Overview
**ONEIROMANCY SPELLS**

**1st Level**

**[[Restful Slumber (Spell)|Restful Slumber]]****:** Sleep soundly, without nightmares.

**4th Level**

**[[Dream Walk (Spell)|Dream Walk]]****:** As many as eight subjects enter a dreamscape.

**[[Manifest Desire (Spell)|Manifest Desire]]****:** Target’s greatest desire appears before her.

**[[Manifest Nightmare (Spell)|Manifest Nightmare]]:** Target’s greatest fear appears before him, making him [[Shaken|shaken]] or [[Panicked|panicked]].

**5th Level**

**[[Dreaming Puppet (Spell)|Dreaming Puppet]]****:** Control the physical body of a sleeping creature.

**7th Level**

**Dream Sight:** Your spirit can leave your body and explore for 1 minute/level.
